cpu.description: CPU quota in units of 10-9 CPUs.
cpu.bounds: NanoCpus value should be in bytes, ex. 1 CPU = 1,000,000,000 (1 billion) NanoCPUs

cpu.description: Microseconds of CPU time that the container can get in a CPU period.
The length of a CPU period in microseconds.
An integer value representing this container's relative CPU weight versus other containers.
Memory nodes (MEMs) in which to allow execution (0-3, 0,1). Only effective on NUMA systems.

memory.description: The maximum amount of memory the container can use.
memory.bounds: Memory value should be in bytes, ex. 512MB = 512 * 1024 * 1024 = 536870912 bytes

memory.description: Controls the total memory + swap usage.
Tune a container's memory swappiness behavior.
